entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Project template improvements #22813
  • Fatal signal 6 (SIGABRT), code -6 (SI_TKILL) in tid 25847 (.NET TP Worker) - Bridge SCC at index must NOT be alive #22812
  • Bridge SCC at index must NOT be alive #22811
  • Sometimes .ttf files are missing in the application after the apk or aab build #22806
  • Add a platform specific for ripple color #22805
  • TemplateView applies Background to root view #22802
  • [Testing] Fix CI related issues with Window based tests on catalyst #22799
    Backlog
  • [ios] update MemoryAnalyzers package, add to Controls #22798
    .NET 8 SR7
  • CS0117: 'Resource' does not contain a definition for #22796
  • WinRt exception when page navigated #22790
  • Add DateTimeOffset overload to Preferences #22786

Closed

  • TemplateBinding with CornerRadius on Border does not work anymore #21747
    .NET 8 SR6
  • [macOS] Crash in multi-window mode in the Controls.sample project #21306
    .NET 8 SR6
  • System.ObjectDisposedException: ObjectDisposed_Generic ObjectDisposed_ObjectName_Name, Android.OS.PowerManager #22204
    .NET 8 SR6
  • Improving Navigation Speed and Performance #14591
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Memory Leak in Style with Trigger #22036
    Backlog
  • iOS App crashes when populating CollectionView #22754
  • (iOS) - Memory Leak in CollectionView with GroupItemTemplate on iOS in MAUI #22752

PullRequests

Created

  • [ios/catalyst] fix leak in NavigationPage #22810
    memory-leak 💦
  • Adopt chromium methodology for determining tablet on Windows #22809
    community ✨
  • [XC] Respects GenerateFullPaths #22808
  • Fixing _loaded event firing logic #22807
    community ✨
  • [workload] fix missing files during the build #22804
  • [XC] Produce warning when x:DataType is inherited from outer scope of `DataTemplate` #22803
    area-xaml
  • Increase MAUI library supported version to 13.0 #22794
  • Make sure the package source mapping is correct #22788
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix RadioButton selection in Group #22787
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-radiobutton

Merged

  • Revert "[ios] fix memory leak in RadioButton #22800
  • Support changing Window coordinates while changing those coordinates #22583
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window
  • Memory Leak in Style with Trigger - fix #22503
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • Remove .NET 7 from bug template #22759
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Make sure ImageButton always has a background #22717
    area-controls-button
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #22712
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] Navigation layout improvement #22785
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨
  • Fixed scroll to group item on Android + Windows #16704
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Windows] Fix ListView insert not working properly #22746
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-listview
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests (alternative) #22635
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [iOS] Fix setting the CurrentItem on CarouselView load #22279
    area-controls-collectionview
  • [Windows] Optimize getting default font size and font family values #22782
    platform/windows 🪟, area-fonts, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [Windows] Fix crash using ScrollTo on CollectionView #19921
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview
  • Entry fields do not work correctly if bound to a numeric property from a ViewModel - fix #22777
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Windows] Subscribe less pointer events in `UpdatingGestureRecognizers` #22781
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22537
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
